backend/main.mo: Defines data models for salons, bookings, users, and images, sets up access control and storage mixins, and seeds demo Swiss salons if none exist.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains humanâ€‘written summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple wrapper that renders and exports AppV1 as the root application component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Full in-file demo UI with categories, salons, presets, and custom components implementing intro feed, salon cards, details, and pro studio features without backend calls.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an authentication header component.
Empty placeholder for a salon creation form component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a loyalty member card component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder for a toggle controlling monopoly mode.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder for a motion-enabled button component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder for a premium salon badge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder for a pressable wrapper component with tactile feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder for a modal handling user profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder for a multi-step salon creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder for a pro studio salon creation interface.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder for a revenue chart visualization.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder for a salon list UI section.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a VIP dashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity, with automatic refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider wrapping Dfinity AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future query-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder hook for salon image handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and custom animation utilities for light/dark mode and UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty placeholder page for the client dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the login flow.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the professional dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page intended to display detailed salon information.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates descriptive marketing text for salons based on category, type, tags, and location.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty utility file for currency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project's reset state, goals, architecture notes, and known issues.
